text: The National Rally for Reform and Development, often known by its shortened Arabic name Tewassoul or by the abbreviation of its French name (RNRD), is an Islamist political party in Mauritania. The party is associated with the Mauritanian part of the Muslim Brotherhood. The 2013, 2018, and 2023 parliamentary elections made Tewassoul the second largest political party in Mauritania. ==References== Category:Political parties in Africa Category:Politics of Mauritania Category:2007 establishments in Africa
title: National Rally for Reform and Development
